evidence: Highly accurate protein structure prediction with AlphaFold. We developed AlphaFold, a deep learning system that predicts protein structures with atomic accuracy even in cases in which no similar structure is known.

Accurate prediction of protein structures and interactions using a three-track neural network. RoseTTAFold can generate accurate models of protein structures and complexes using as input only a protein sequence.
Critical assessment of techniques for protein structure prediction, fourteenth round. AlphaFold2 achieved unprecedented accuracy with median GDT-TS scores above 90 on difficult targets.
Attention is all you need. We propose a new simple network architecture, the Transformer, based solely on attention mechanisms, dispensing with recurrence and convolutions entirely.

TM-align: a protein structure alignment algorithm based on the TM-score. TM-score is a scale-independent metric designed to be more sensitive than RMSD for measuring the structural similarity of protein pairs.
